name: World of Geeks
features: A user can select the quiz topic.
Responsive for mobile and desktop.
A user needs to be logged in for premium access.
An error is shown for,when the entered user email/password wrong.
Error: 404' is shown if the path is not appropriate.
Some frequently asked question answers are shown in the FAQ route.
tech: Tailwind CSS, React Router DOM, Firebase, Google and Git sign in method, React to PDF, Vercel for server deploy.

name: Photo Ink
features: An user can select,in which service they wanna review
Responsive for mobile and desktop.
If anyone wants to drop review they need to login first
An error is shown for,when the entered user email/password wrong.
Error: 404' is shown if the path is not appropriate.
Some frequently asked question answers are shown in the FAQ route.
If user is logged in,he/she can see the reviews dropped by himself/herself and also add services to the library.
tech: Tailwind, React Router DOM, Firebase, Vercel, JWT

name: Wish Boat
features: This is a full-stack website for reselling and buying used electronics.
There is a dashboard which is dynamically changed when a buyer / seller / admin login.
Responsive for mobile and desktop.
A user needs to be logged in for purchasing an item
An error is shown for,when the entered user email/password wrong.
Error: 404' is shown if the path is not appropriate.
Some frequently asked question answers are shown in the BLOGS route.
Buyer can report an item to admin and an admin can delete that reported item.
Seller can add products for sale,advertise them,and also check whether his products are sold or available.
tech: React Router, Firebase, Vercel, JWT, React Query, CRUD, MongoDB, Tailwind, Daisy UI, Stripe.
